languages.text: "Я понимаю, что ты беспокоишься. Возможно, ты уже не доверяешь моему суждению по этому поводу, но... после того срыва я больше не чувствую былого напряжения и былой опасности. Кажется, мой контроль над колдовством восстановился... по крайней мере частично".

"I understand your concern. You may no longer trust my judgement in this matter, but... since that breach, I have no longer felt the same tension or the same danger. My control over my sorcery seems to have recovered... at least partially."
languages.original_text: "Я понимаю, что ты беспокоишься. Возможно, ты уже не доверяешь моему суждению по этому поводу, но... после того срыва я больше не чувствую былого напряжения и былой опасности. Кажется, мой контроль над колдовством восстановился... по крайней мере частично".

traits.locale_text: "I understand your concern. You may no longer trust my judgement in this matter, but... since that breach, I have no longer felt the same tension or the same danger. My control over my sorcery seems to have recovered... at least partially."
traits.speaker: HeinrixCompanion

traits.locale_text: "I understand your concern. You may no longer trust my judgement in this matter, but... since that breach, I have no longer felt the same tension or the same danger. My control over my sorcery seems to have recovered... at least partially."

traits.locale_text: "I understand your concern. You may no longer trust my judgement in this matter, but... since that breach, I have no longer felt the same tension or the same danger. My control over my sorcery seems to have recovered... at least partially."
traits.speaker: HeinrixCompanion

languages.text: «Comprendo su preocupación. Puede que ya no confíe en mi criterio en este asunto, pero... desde la brecha no he vuelto a sentir la misma tensión ni el mismo peligro. Se diría que he recuperado el control de mi hechicería... al menos en parte».
languages.original_text: "I understand your concern. You may no longer trust my judgement in this matter, but... since that breach, I have no longer felt the same tension or the same danger. My control over my sorcery seems to have recovered... at least partially."

traits.locale_text: «Comprendo su preocupación. Puede que ya no confíe en mi criterio en este asunto, pero... desde la brecha no he vuelto a sentir la misma tensión ni el mismo peligro. Se diría que he recuperado el control de mi hechicería... al menos en parte».
traits.speaker: HeinrixCompanion

languages.text: 「心配する気持ちはわかる。もはや俺が何を言っても信用できないかもしれないが…あの違反以来、似たような緊張感も危険も感じなくなった。魔術の制御も回復したようだ…少なくとも、部分的には」
languages.original_text: "I understand your concern. You may no longer trust my judgement in this matter, but... since that breach, I have no longer felt the same tension or the same danger. My control over my sorcery seems to have recovered... at least partially."

traits.locale_text: 「心配する気持ちはわかる。もはや俺が何を言っても信用できないかもしれないが…あの違反以来、似たような緊張感も危険も感じなくなった。魔術の制御も回復したようだ…少なくとも、部分的には」
traits.speaker: HeinrixCompanion

languages.text: “我理解你的忧虑。或许你不再相信我在这方面的判断，不过……自从那次失控之后，我再也没有感觉到那样的紧张或是危机感。我对巫术的控制能力似乎恢复了……至少恢复了一部分。”
languages.original_text: "I understand your concern. You may no longer trust my judgement in this matter, but... since that breach, I have no longer felt the same tension or the same danger. My control over my sorcery seems to have recovered... at least partially."

traits.locale_text: “我理解你的忧虑。或许你不再相信我在这方面的判断，不过……自从那次失控之后，我再也没有感觉到那样的紧张或是危机感。我对巫术的控制能力似乎恢复了……至少恢复了一部分。”
traits.speaker: HeinrixCompanion

languages.text: « Je comprends votre inquiétude. Vous n'avez peut-être plus confiance en mon jugement à ce propos, mais... depuis cette intrusion, je n'ai pas ressenti ce genre de tension ou de danger. Je semble avoir repris le contrôle de ma sorcellerie... en partie, tout du moins. »
languages.original_text: "I understand your concern. You may no longer trust my judgement in this matter, but... since that breach, I have no longer felt the same tension or the same danger. My control over my sorcery seems to have recovered... at least partially."

traits.locale_text: « Je comprends votre inquiétude. Vous n'avez peut-être plus confiance en mon jugement à ce propos, mais... depuis cette intrusion, je n'ai pas ressenti ce genre de tension ou de danger. Je semble avoir repris le contrôle de ma sorcellerie... en partie, tout du moins. »
traits.speaker: HeinrixCompanion

languages.text: "Ich verstehe Eure Sorge. Ihr vertraut meinem Urteil in dieser Sache vielleicht nicht mehr, doch ... seit diesem Vorfall spüre ich nicht mehr dieselbe Anspannung oder Gefahr. Meine Kontrolle über meine Hexerei scheint wieder hergestellt zu sein ... zumindest teilweise."
languages.original_text: "I understand your concern. You may no longer trust my judgement in this matter, but... since that breach, I have no longer felt the same tension or the same danger. My control over my sorcery seems to have recovered... at least partially."

traits.locale_text: "Ich verstehe Eure Sorge. Ihr vertraut meinem Urteil in dieser Sache vielleicht nicht mehr, doch ... seit diesem Vorfall spüre ich nicht mehr dieselbe Anspannung oder Gefahr. Meine Kontrolle über meine Hexerei scheint wieder hergestellt zu sein ... zumindest teilweise."
traits.speaker: HeinrixCompanion

languages.original_text: "I understand your concern. You may no longer trust my judgement in this matter, but... since that breach, I have no longer felt the same tension or the same danger. My control over my sorcery seems to have recovered... at least partially."

languages.text: "Endişeni anlıyorum. Bu hususta güvenin sarsılmış olabilir ama... O kırılmadan beri öyle bir gerilim veya tehlike sezmedim. Büyülerime olan hâkimiyetimi kısmen de olsa geri kazanıyorum gibi."
languages.original_text: "I understand your concern. You may no longer trust my judgement in this matter, but... since that breach, I have no longer felt the same tension or the same danger. My control over my sorcery seems to have recovered... at least partially."

traits.locale_text: "Endişeni anlıyorum. Bu hususta güvenin sarsılmış olabilir ama... O kırılmadan beri öyle bir gerilim veya tehlike sezmedim. Büyülerime olan hâkimiyetim geri dönüyor gibi. Kısmen yani."
traits.speaker: HeinrixCompanion
